attributes.additional_details:
It has been announced that Sky Sports will have the rights to show all F1 races from 2012 onwards, and the BBC will now only show half of them.

The Sky coverage will have a different presenting and commentary team, and worst of all you will have to pay Rupert Murdoch hundreds of pounds per year for the privilege of watching it.

Sign and share this petition to keep F1 on the BBC for every race!

We ask the governement to put a stop to this contract, and make the BBC honor their original contract.
